description: When GATEWAY TO THEATRES perform in a sc
overview: The company gateway to theatres is a theatre company, developing and promoting the concept of theatres and techniques in education in India named as T’N’TIE…. started by Gaurav Pahwa The Company provides support lines to education, attached with various schools and institutions of Delhi, for than five years now. Teaching Students from K to 12, various theatre exercises and other techniques in education developed over the past many years help the children to improve their confidence level and their power of speech. Theatre helps them to realize their full potential and help them to come out of their shells and giving a hope to those who feel that they are weak in studies. We are attached with various schools like Delhi Public School, G D Goenka Public school, Holy child (Muzzafar nagar), The Heritage School, Ryan International School, St Francis De Sales, St. Mary’s Convent, Kasauli, Manavstali School, Bal Bharati Public School, to name a few providing them Theatre in education.
